description: Blitz is a faster-paced version of Battle Royale. The match begins with the storm moving towards the island, and the delay between each circle is shorter than normal, creating matches that are 15 minutes long or less. The map also has extra loot and resources. Profile Stats count in this mode, so fight hard for the Victory Royale!

Prove your skill in this competitive mode!  During each match, you'll earn Hype by either achieving high placements or eliminating opponents.  As you gain Hype, you'll compete against tougher opponents with similar skill level.
Close Quarters Combat with Shotguns & Jetpacks! To use a jetpack, double-tap the jump button to take off. Keep the button held down to apply thrust. Make sure to land before it runs out of fuel!

Prove your skill in this competitive mode!  During each match, you'll earn points by either achieving high placements or eliminating multiple opponents.  As you gain points, you'll compete against tougher opponents with similar scores.

One team infiltrates the other team's base, fighting to extract Briefcases filled with Top Secret Intel. The Defenders' job is to guard each Case for the required time, and eliminate any Attacker who steals one before they get away.

Each Case that your team Extracts or successfully Defends will funnel Intel to the allegiance of your choice, allowing you to unlock additional Spytech (weapons and items that can be used in this mode).
Ice blocks on everyone's feet, infinite ammo Grapplers in everyone's inventory - a recipe for a slippery good time!

Prove your skill in this competitive mode!  During each match, you'll earn points by either achieving high placements or eliminating multiple opponents.  As you gain points, you'll compete against tougher opponents with similar scores.
Treasure chests contain Epic or better weapons as well as the occasional Infinity Blade! Fight your opponents to find out who is worthy of the Blade... and who is not.

Two large teams fight for the Victory Royale in an action-packed mode where the first team to get the target number of eliminations wins! 

Dangerous lava rises gradually from the lowest parts of the map. Quickly loot, gather materials, and then start building up to stay away from the lava!

All player-built structures have drastically increased health, but a true builder doesn't break down walls, they edit through them! Neutral editing has been turned on to allow players to edit structures no matter which team placed them. And what kind of paradise would keep a builder short on supplies? Building material drop rates are increased to allow as much building as desired!
Survive until the end to earn a Victory Royale!

Final Fight is Battle Royale with an alternate ending! Instead of the storm circles closing all the way in, they will stop part way through the match, triggering a Final Countdown. The team with the most players alive at the end of the Countdown wins the Victory Royale!

Surf's Up! Jump out of the Battle Bus and on to your shiny new surfboard. Use impulse grenades to bounce enemy players into the storm. Race against the storm and the other surfers to be the last one standing!

Prove your skill in this competitive mode!  During each match, you'll earn Hype by either achieving high placements or eliminating opponents.  As you gain Hype, you'll compete against tougher opponents with similar skill level.
Low Gravity. Every player has 50 health. Sniper weapons are the only weapon, Bandages and the occasional Small Fry are the only healing items. Jump high and aim well!
Survive until the end to earn a Victory Royale!
Classic Battle Royale gameplay with a limited set of weapons and items including a few that have been returned from the vault!
Battle Royale with Explosive weapons only! 'Splode all of the enemies back to the lobby to earn the Victory Royale!
In this mode, all guns have been removed. The only weapons are grenades and other items that can be thrown or tossed. Get in there and throw the enemies back to the lobby!
All weapon drops are Rare. Storm circles move a bit more quickly. Building material farming rates are increased.

Blitz is a faster-paced version of Battle Royale. The match begins with the storm moving towards the island, and the delay between each circle is shorter than normal, creating matches that are 15 minutes long or less. The map also has extra loot and resources. Profile Stats count in this mode, so fight hard for the Victory Royale!
Low Gravity. Every player has 50 health. Cupid's Crossbow is the only weapon, Bandages are the only healing item. Jump high and spread the love!

You're tough but not unstoppable, if you are eliminated three times you are out for good. 

Stay alive and collect gold tokens by eliminating the other bounty hunters. The first team to reach the required token count wins, but be careful how far ahead you get - token leaders are marked on the map for all to see.
Players can only deal damage with headshots, so take your time and line up your shots!
Survive until the end to earn a Victory Royale!
Go it alone in a battle to be the last one standing.
Represent one of the two teams from the Big Game by fighting for the Victory Royale in an action-packed mode where the first team to get 100 eliminations wins!
Players are granted building materials at the start of the match without the ability to gain more throughout the match. Make what you are given at the start last because that's all you get!

Fight for the Victory Royale in an action-packed mode where the first player to get the target number of eliminations wins! 

Respawn on elimination is ON for the entire match. Glider items with 50 charges will automatically be added to everyone's inventory.
Go it alone in a battle to be the last one standing.

Food Fight: Defend the Mascots, 16v16. The battle of Durrburger versus Pete's Pizza has begun. Two teams on either side of the map. A huge barrier down the middle. Build a fort to protect your restaurant mascot. When the Barrier lowers, destroy the enemy's mascot to win the match!

Surf's Up! Jump out of the Battle Bus and on to your shiny new surfboard. Use impulse grenades to bounce enemy players into the storm. Race against the storm and the other surfers to be the last one standing!

Blitz is a faster-paced version of Battle Royale. The match begins with the storm moving towards the island, and the delay between each circle is shorter than normal, creating matches that are 15 minutes long or less. The map also has extra loot and resources. Profile Stats count in this mode, so fight hard for the Victory Royale!
Survive until the end to earn a Victory Royale!

Prove your skill in this competitive mode!  During each match, you'll earn Hype by either achieving high placements or eliminating opponents.  As you gain Hype, you'll compete against tougher opponents with similar skill level.
Pair up with a buddy and take everyone else down.

One team infiltrates the other team's base, fighting to extract Briefcases filled with Top Secret Intel. The Defenders' job is to guard each Case for the required time, and eliminate any Attacker who steals one before they get away.

Each Case that your team Extracts or successfully Defends will funnel Intel to the allegiance of your choice, allowing you to unlock additional Spytech (weapons and items that can be used in this mode).
Players can only deal damage with headshots, so take your time and line up your shots!
Pair up with a buddy and take everyone else down.
Survive until the end to earn a Victory Royale!
Group up and outlast all of the other squads gunning for victory.

Prove your skill in this competitive mode!  During each match, you'll earn points by either achieving high placements or eliminating multiple opponents.  As you gain points, you'll compete against tougher opponents with similar scores.

Two large teams fight to capture Intel that appears in special Supply Drops, in order to level up and unlock new Tech (weapons, items and abilities).

Every Intel Drop captured also grants that team ten points towards the Elimination Goal.

Respawn and Ammo Regeneration is ON and looting is OFF. Tech is ACTIVE. The first team to reach the Elimination Goal wins and earns bonus Intel.

All player-built structures have drastically increased health, but a true builder doesn't break down walls, they edit through them! Neutral editing has been turned on to allow players to edit structures no matter which team placed them. And what kind of paradise would keep a builder short on supplies? Building material drop rates are increased to allow as much building as desired!

This mode is played in two phases. During the first phase, respawn on elimination is ON and using shield items increases your max shield capacity. After a period of time, respawning will switch to OFF. At this point, everyone's shields will automatically be fully recharged. The remaining players will then fight to the finish!

Note: Supply drops have TONS of shield pickups.

One team infiltrates the other team's base, fighting to extract Briefcases filled with Top Secret Intel. The Defenders' job is to guard each Case for the required time, and eliminate any Attacker who steals one before they get away.

Each Case that your team Extracts or successfully Defends will funnel Intel to the allegiance of your choice, allowing you to unlock additional Spytech (weapons and items that can be used in this mode).
All players gets a new loadout that continues to change through the course of a match. Compete to be the last one standing, and prove you are the best with a variety of weapons!
Survive until the end to earn a Victory Royale!
Land near a Red Supply Drop, grab a Driftboard and some weapons, meet up with your team and race to eliminate the enemies. Last team standing wins!
Ready, aim, fire! Sniper weapons only. No reviving - get downed and it's back to the lobby.
Low Gravity. Every player has 50 health. Sniper weapons are the only weapon, Bandages and the occasional Small Fry are the only healing items. Jump high and aim well!

One team infiltrates the other team's base, fighting to extract Briefcases filled with Top Secret Intel. The Defenders' job is to guard each Case for the required time, and eliminate any Attacker who steals one before they get away.

Each Case that your team Extracts or successfully Defends will funnel Intel to the allegiance of your choice, allowing you to unlock additional Spytech (weapons and items that can be used in this mode).
This mode combines the explosive fun of the High Explosives LTM and the vaulted Limited Time Item Jetpack. Take to the skies and blast everyone else back to the lobby!

At the start of the match, all players are granted a weapon loadout. During the match, everyone's loadout will switch over time. 

Compete to have the most eliminations, and prove you are the best with a variety of weapons!

Two large teams fight to capture Intel that appears in special Supply Drops, in order to level up and unlock new Tech (weapons, items and abilities).

Every Intel Drop captured also grants that team ten points towards the Elimination Goal.

Respawn and Ammo Regeneration is ON and looting is OFF. Tech is ACTIVE. The first team to reach the Elimination Goal wins and earns bonus Intel.
Shhhhh be very very quiet!

This mode is a twist on the traditional 50 vs. 50 mode, featuring an extra emphasis on mobility. Gliders can be re-deployed when falling from large heights. Additional Shockwave Grenades and Launch Pads will be spawned throughout the map. Jump in and soar to new heights!

Prove your skill in this competitive mode!  During each match, you'll earn points by either achieving high placements or eliminating multiple opponents.  As you gain points, you'll compete against tougher opponents with similar scores.

Fight for the Victory Royale in an action-packed mode where the first duo to get the target number of eliminations wins! Respawn on elimination is ON for the entire match. Glider items with 50 charges will automatically be added to everyone's inventory.
Player health and shields drastically increased. Healing items removed and replaced with siphon (health granted on elimination). Let the best tank win!

At the start of the match, all players are granted a weapon loadout. During the match, everyone's loadout will switch over time. 

Compete to have the most eliminations, and prove you are the best with a variety of weapons!

All players have a slurp effect granting health and shields over time as long as all members of their team are alive. 

If players are knocked down but not out they become invulnerable to damage, but the heal over time effect that their teammates have will change to damage over time.
Players are granted building materials at the start of the match without the ability to gain more throughout the match. Make what you are given at the start last because that's all you get!

This mode has the map, compass, storm timer and many other elements of the Heads Up Display turned off. Determining who is friendly and who isn't during firefights and staying away from the storm will be key to picking up a Victory Royale!
Battle Royale with Explosive weapons only! 'Splode all of the enemies back to the lobby to earn the Victory Royale!
In this mode, only the "Heavy" weapon variants can be found in loot boxes. Get your loadout and get in the fight!

Prove your skill in this competitive mode!  During each match, you'll earn points by either achieving high placements or eliminating multiple opponents.  As you gain points, you'll compete against tougher opponents with similar scores.
All healing items have been removed in this mode. The only way to gain health or shields is to eliminate your opponents!
Ready, aim, fire! Sniper only.
Team up and end the Storm King's reign.
Go it alone in a battle to be the last one standing.

Two large teams fight to capture Intel that appears in special Supply Drops, in order to level up and unlock new Tech (weapons, items and abilities).

Every Intel Drop captured also grants that team ten points towards the Elimination Goal.

Respawn and Ammo Regeneration is ON and looting is OFF. Tech is ACTIVE. The first team to reach the Elimination Goal wins and earns bonus Intel.
All weapon drops are Epic. Storm circles move a bit more quickly. Building material farming rates are increased.

One team infiltrates the other team's base, fighting to extract Briefcases filled with Top Secret Intel. The Defenders job is to guard each Case for the required time, and eliminate any Attacker who steals one before they get away.

Each Case that your team Extracts or successfully Defends will funnel Intel to the allegiance of your choice, allowing you to unlock additional Spytech (weapons and items that can be used in this mode).
Group up and outlast all of the other squads gunning for victory.
The storm absolutely will... not... stop. Ever!

Two teams of fifty players fight to the finish! This version of the mode only has Legendary weapons. Gold guns will be everywhere, along with extra loot and resources, a storm that is more lethal, and a shorter match length time than the standard Battle Royale modes. Each team drops from their own Battle Bus. Get in and help your team to victory!

Prove your skill in this competitive mode!  During each match, you'll earn points by either achieving high placements or eliminating multiple opponents.  As you gain points, you'll compete against tougher opponents with similar scores.
Go it alone in a battle to be the last one standing.
In this mode, players will race to find a Jewel and then escape in one of the getaway vans! The first four squads to escape win the Victory Royale!
Survive until the end to earn a Victory Royale!
Go it alone in a battle to be the last one standing.

Two large teams fight to capture Intel that appears in special Supply Drops, in order to level up and unlock new Tech (weapons, items and abilities).

Every Intel Drop captured also grants that team ten points towards the Elimination Goal.

Respawn and Ammo Regeneration is ON and looting is OFF. Tech is ACTIVE. The first team to reach the Elimination Goal wins and earns bonus Intel.

All players gets a new loadout that continues to change through the course of a match. Compete to be the last one standing, and prove you are the best with a variety of weapons!
Player health and shields drastically increased. Healing items removed and replaced with siphon (health granted on elimination). Let the best tank win!
Think before you place is the name of the game. Stone and metal wall health has been increased but the resource caps and resource farming rates have been reduced.
Player health and shields drastically increased. Healing items removed and replaced with siphon (health granted on elimination). Let the best tank win!

One team infiltrates the other team's base, fighting to extract Briefcases filled with Top Secret Intel. The Defenders' job is to guard each Case for the required time, and eliminate any Attacker who steals one before they get away.

Each Case that your team Extracts or successfully Defends will funnel Intel to the allegiance of your choice, allowing you to unlock additional Spytech (weapons and items that can be used in this mode).
All against Player Solos

All players have a slurp effect granting health and shields over time as long as their teammate is alive & not downed. 

If a player is knocked down they become invulnerable to damage, but the heal over time effect that their teammate has will change to damage over time. Revive your partner as fast as possible!

Prove your skill in this competitive mode!  During each match, you'll earn points by either achieving high placements or eliminating multiple opponents.  As you gain points, you'll compete against tougher opponents with similar scores.
Pair up with a buddy and take everyone else down.
Low Gravity. Every player has 50 health. Sniper weapons are the only weapon, Bandages and the occasional Small Fry are the only healing items. Jump high and aim well!
Fight for the Victory Royale using a limited set of weapons and items such as Hunting Rifles, Shotguns and Dynamite. This town ain't big enough for the hundred of us!
Ready, aim, fire! Sniper weapons only. No reviving - get downed and it's back to the lobby.
Shhhhh be very very quiet!
All weapon drops are Epic. Storm circles move a bit more quickly. Building material farming rates are increased.
Land near a Red Supply Drop, grab a Driftboard and some weapons, meet up with your team and race to eliminate the enemies. Last team standing wins!

This mode has the map, compass, storm timer and many other elements of the Heads Up Display turned off. Determining who is friendly and who isn't during firefights and staying away from the storm will be key to picking up a Victory Royale.!
Classic Battle Royale with gliders that can be re-deployed by pressing Jump when falling from large heights.

Two large teams fight for the Victory Royale in an action-packed mode where the first team to get the target number of eliminations wins! 

Respawn on elimination is ON for the entire match, and gliders can be freely deployed whenever you are far enough from the ground.
In this mode, only the "Heavy" weapon variants can be found in loot boxes. Get your loadout and get in the fight!
All weapon drops are Legendary!
Go it alone in a battle to be the last one standing.
All weapon drops are Rare. Storm circles move a bit more quickly. Building material farming rates are increased.
All weapon drops are Legendary!
Battle Royale gameplay with a limited set of weapons made up entirely of items that are vaulted in the standard modes.
All players gets a new loadout that continues to change through the course of a match. Compete to be the last one standing, and prove you are the best with a variety of weapons!
Dangerous lava rises gradually from the lowest parts of the map. Quickly loot, gather materials, and then start building up to stay away from the lava!

Temp Playlist to test Henchmen Performances. (Squads)
Survive until the end to earn a Victory Royale!
Fight for the Victory Royale using a limited set of weapons and items such as Hunting Rifles, Shotguns and Dynamite. This town ain't big enough for the hundred of us!

Prove your skill in this competitive mode!  During each match, you'll earn points by either achieving high placements or eliminating multiple opponents.  As you gain points, you'll compete against tougher opponents with similar scores.
Dangerous lava rises gradually from the lowest parts of the map. Quickly loot, gather materials, and then start building up to stay away from the lava!
Temp Playlist to test without Henchmen (Squads)
The only weapons in the game are the automatic firing ones. Spray and pray!

Compete to earn Intel in a four-round bracket squad battle! The squad with the most eliminations at the end of the round moves on. The squad that wins the 4th round wins the match and earns the most Intel, unlocking new Tech to use in this and other "Operation" modes. 

Respawn and Ammo Regeneration is ON and looting is OFF. Tech is ACTIVE.
Welcome to the Party! Leave your weapons and mats behind and hang out with friends, play games, perfect your skydive and more. The party’s just getting started!
Land near a Red Supply Drop, grab a Driftboard and some weapons, meet up with your team and race to eliminate the enemies. Last team standing wins!
Classic Battle Royale with Three-Person Squads.

It's time for the ultimate dance-off. Dance Floors have spawned around the Battle Royale island. Take them over by clearing out any enemies and then dancing to raise a disco ball up from the floor. The team that earns the most points by capturing and defending the dance floors will win the match!
In this mode, players will race to find a Jewel and then escape in one of the getaway vans! The first four players to escape win the Victory Royale!

Two teams of fifty players fight to the finish! This version of the mode only has explosive weapons, along with extra loot and resources, a storm that is more lethal, and a shorter match length time than the standard Battle Royale modes. Each team drops from their own Battle Bus. Get in and help your team to victory!

Dangerous lava rises gradually from the lowest parts of the map. Quickly loot, gather materials, and then start building up to stay away from the lava!
Classic Battle Royale with gliders that can be re-deployed by pressing Jump when falling from large heights.

Each Case that your team Extracts or successfully Defends will funnel Intel to the allegiance of your choice, allowing you to unlock additional Spytech (weapons and items that can be used in this mode).

Compete to have the most eliminations, and prove you are the best with a variety of weapons!
Fight for the Victory Royale using a limited set of weapons and items such as Hunting Rifles, Shotguns and Dynamite. This town ain't big enough for the hundred of us!

Final Fight is Battle Royale with an alternate ending! Instead of the storm circles closing all the way in, they will stop part way through the match, triggering a Final Countdown. The team with the most players alive at the end of the Countdown wins the Victory Royale!
Survive until the end to earn a Victory Royale!

Fortnite Fiends are back on the island and angrier than ever! Fight alongside your teammates to rack up your score by finding hidden score multipliers, opening special loot chests, and eliminating as many monsters as you can. Traverse across the map, survive all of the Defend locations and take down the Final Boss to win!

Can you make it all the way to the end and set a new high score? Ready up and find out!

One team infiltrates the other team's base, fighting to extract Briefcases filled with Top Secret Intel. The Defenders' job is to guard each Case for the required time, and eliminate any Attacker who steals one before they get away.

Each Case that your team Extracts or successfully Defends will funnel Intel to the allegiance of your choice, allowing you to unlock additional Spytech (weapons and items that can be used in this mode).
Monsters have invaded the Battle Royale island! Two teams will battle it out as Cube Monsters join the fight. Defeat the other team to earn a Victory Royale.

Just want to Risky & Chill? Hang out in Now Playing to catch the hourly screenings of Punk’d. Top of the hour, every hour.

Sharpen your skills by eliminating targets and rise to the top of the leaderboards in this timed solo course.

In Ground Game, the focus is on fighting smart - Spray & Pray and Build Spamming isn't an option here. Fewer building materials can be carried and max ammo count is limited, so use the natural cover that the map provides and make every shot count!

Compete to earn Intel in a four-round bracket battle! The team with the most eliminations at the end of the round moves on. The team that wins the 4th round wins the match and earns the most Intel, unlocking new Tech to use in this and other "Operation" modes. 

Respawn and Ammo Regeneration is ON and looting is OFF. Tech is ACTIVE.
Earn Intel in a 4-Round Bracket Battle!  Most Eliminations in the time limit moves on to the next Round.  Respawn and Ammo Regeneration is ON for this mode and Tech is ACTIVE.
Go it alone in a battle to be the last one standing.

Prove your skill in this competitive mode!  During each match, you'll earn points by either achieving high placements or eliminating multiple opponents.  As you gain points, you'll compete against tougher opponents with similar scores.

Food Fight: Deep Fried. Two teams on either side of the map. A huge barrier down the middle. Lava steadily rising up from below. Build a fort to protect your restaurant mascot. When the Barrier lowers, destroy the enemy's mascot and then eliminate the remaining enemies to win the match!
Ice blocks on everyone's feet, infinite ammo Grapplers in everyone's inventory - a recipe for a slippery good time!
All healing items have been removed in this mode. The only way to gain health or shields is to eliminate your opponents!
Close Quarters Combat with Shotguns & Jetpacks! To use a jetpack, double-tap the jump button to take off. Keep the button held down to apply thrust. Make sure to land before it runs out of fuel!
Classic Battle Royale gameplay with a limited set of weapons and items including a few that have been returned from the vault!

Five teams of twenty players fight to the finish! This mode has extra loot and resources and a storm that is more lethal than in the standard Battle Royale modes. Each team drops from their own Battle Bus. Get in and help your team to victory!
Go it alone in a battle to be the last one standing.
The only weapons in the game are the automatic firing ones. Spray and pray!

One team infiltrates the other team's base, fighting to extract Briefcases filled with Top Secret Intel. The Defenders' job is to guard each Case for the required time, and eliminate any Attacker who steals one before they get away.

Each Case that your team Extracts or successfully Defends will funnel Intel to the allegiance of your choice, allowing you to unlock additional Spytech (weapons and items that can be used in this mode).

The High Table has opened a new contract. You're tough but not unstoppable, if you are eliminated three times you are out for good. 

Stay alive and collect gold tokens by eliminating the other bounty hunters. The first team to reach the required token count wins, but be careful how far ahead you get - token leaders are marked on the map for all to see.

This mode has the map, compass, storm timer and many other elements of the Heads Up Display turned off. Determining who is friendly and who isn't during firefights and staying away from the storm will be key to picking up a Victory Royale!

Compete to earn Intel in a four-round bracket squad battle! The squad with the most eliminations at the end of the round moves on. The squad that wins the 4th round wins the match and earns the most Intel, unlocking new Tech to use in this and other "Operation" modes. 

Respawn and Ammo Regeneration is ON and looting is OFF. Tech is ACTIVE.
Go it alone in a battle to be the last one standing.

One team infiltrates the other team's base, fighting to extract Briefcases filled with Top Secret Intel. The Defenders' job is to guard each Case for the required time, and eliminate any Attacker who steals one before they get away.

Each Case that your team Extracts or successfully Defends will funnel Intel to the allegiance of your choice, allowing you to unlock additional Spytech (weapons and items that can be used in this mode).

All players have a slurp effect granting health and shields over time as long as all members of their team are alive. 

If players are knocked down but not out they become invulnerable to damage, but the heal over time effect that their teammates have will change to damage over time. Revive your teammates as fast as possible!
Two large teams fight for the Victory Royale in an action-packed mode where the first team to get the target number of eliminations wins! Eliminating a player grants 50 health/shields.
Players are granted building materials at the start of the match without the ability to gain more throughout the match. Make what you are given at the start last because that's all you get!
Ice blocks on everyone's feet, infinite ammo Grapplers in everyone's inventory - a recipe for a slippery good time!
Temp Playlist to test Henchmen Performances.

Three teams of thirty-three players fight to the finish! This mode has extra loot and resources and a storm that is more dangerous than in the standard Battle Royale modes. Each team drops from their own Battle Bus. Get in and help your team to victory!
Go it alone in a battle to be the last one standing.

Prove your skill in this competitive mode!  During each match, you'll earn points by either achieving high placements or eliminating multiple opponents.  As you gain points, you'll compete against tougher opponents with similar scores.

Surf's Up! Jump out of the Battle Bus and on to your shiny new surfboard. Use impulse grenades to bounce enemy players into the storm. Race against the storm and the other surfers to be the last one standing!

Each Case that your team Extracts or successfully Defends will funnel Intel to the allegiance of your choice, allowing you to unlock additional Spytech (weapons and items that can be used in this mode).

Group up and outlast all of the other squads gunning for victory.
Go it alone in a battle to be the last one standing.

Each Case that your team Extracts or successfully Defends will funnel Intel to the allegiance of your choice, allowing you to unlock additional Spytech (weapons and items that can be used in this mode).
All against Player Squads
Low Gravity. Every player has 50 health. Cupid's Crossbow is the only weapon, Bandages are the only healing item. Jump high and spread the love!
Treasure chests contain Epic or better weapons as well as the occasional Infinity Blade! Fight your opponents to find out who is worthy of the Blade... and who is not.

All player-built structures have drastically increased health, but a true builder doesn't break down walls, they edit through them! Neutral editing has been turned on to allow players to edit structures no matter which team placed them. And what kind of paradise would keep a builder short on supplies? Building material drop rates are increased to allow as much building as desired!
All healing items have been removed in this mode. The only way to gain health or shields is to eliminate your opponents!
Team up and end the Storm King's reign.
Earn Intel in a 4-Round Bracket Battle!  Most Eliminations in the time limit moves on to the next Round.  Respawn and Ammo Regeneration is ON for this mode and Tech is ACTIVE.
Players can only deal damage with headshots, so take your time and line up your shots!

It's time for the ultimate dance-off. Dance Floors have spawned around the Battle Royale island. Take them over by clearing out any enemies and then dancing to raise a disco ball up from the floor. The team that earns the most points by capturing and defending the dance floors will win the match!
Go it alone in a battle to be the last one standing.

Two teams of 50 in close quarters combat with Shotguns & Jetpacks! To use a jetpack, double-tap the jump button to take off. Keep the button held down to apply thrust. Make sure to land before it runs out of fuel!
Welcome to the Party! Leave your weapons and mats behind and hang out with friends, play games, perfect your skydive and more. The party’s just getting started!
Pair up with a buddy and take everyone else down.
Go it alone in a battle to be the last one standing.
